name: SNEAKY CAT- Test Demo
description:
As a cat and you are a little explorer, it's time to run away from the humans. Your goal is collect as many fish as you can. You need to find the keys to unlock all the rooms in order to collect all the fish.

-------------Keyboard----------

Player movement

up: Jump

Left: Go Left

Right: Go Right

Space: open the gifts

-----------------------(ΦωΦ) ---------------------

-------------Feature----------

Humans—are the ones that want to catch you, when they catch you you can't escape.

House—you can open the door to go inside.

Fish—your dream about, it's your love.

Key - are needed to get into the different houses.

-----------------------(ΦωΦ) ---------------------
